name: Together:Against
description: A full stack web app worked on in collaboration with other developers that allows users to create virtual events and create a space for dialogue and voting on the outcome of created events.
tools: Bootstrap, Handlebars, Sequelize, MySQL, Express, Passport, Jdenticon, Disqus

name: RVA Venues
description: An app that is a collaborative project that allows for users to search for a song through Spotify and receive recommendations for local RVA venues that match that song's style!
tools: Materialize, JQuery, Spotify API, Yelp API, HTML, CSS

name: Sarvay's Weather App
description: An app designed with the openweathermap API to pull various weather forecasts!
tools: Bootstrap, openweathermap API, HTML, CSS, JQuery

name: Coding Quiz
description: An app that allows students to answer basic coding questions and be scored!

name: Burger App
description: An MVC app that allows users to enter burgers and add them to a database and then edit their database properties all in one page.
tools: Bootstrap, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, JQuery, CSS

name: React Employee Directory
description: A React App that makes a call to the randomuser Api in order to populate a list of employees and then allow for dynamically sorting and searching through that database.
tools: Bootstrap, Express, CSS, React, Axios, randomuser API
